# beget_regions (Data Source)

List of available locations for virtual server placement

## Map Structure
- Key: region ID (e.g., `ru1`, `ru2`, `kz1`, `lv1`)
- Value fields: `id`, `name`, `name_en`, `country`, `available`, `priority`, `short_name`

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Fetch all regions
data "beget_regions" "all" {}

# Access specific region from the map
output "all_ru1" {
  value = data.beget_regions.all.regions["ru1"]
}
```
```terraform
# Fetch available regions in Russia
data "beget_regions" "russia_available" {
  country   = "RU"
  available = true
}

output "ru_available_region_ids" {
  value = keys(data.beget_regions.russia_available.regions)
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `available` (Boolean)
- `country` (String)

### Read-Only

- `regions` (Attributes Map) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--regions))

<a id="nestedatt--regions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `regions`

Read-Only:

- `available` (Boolean)
- `country` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `name_en` (String)
- `priority` (Number)
- `short_name` (String)
